frameset.edef: To know or be aware of

example.parse: (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لا)) (IV1P+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I ندري) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ اذا) (S (PP-PRD (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الامكان))) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM تحسين) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الجباية)))

arg.g: If it is possible to improve collection
